charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was doing some
shopping, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Blue a little ways away.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0300_:
I was atop the arena when I saw you walking,
so I thought I would come down to talk to you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_0400_: You were on top of the arena?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_0500_:
Yeah, the best way to get the lay of the land is
to get a good look from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_0700_:
Nah. Plus, the best way to get 
the lay of the land is to get a good look 
from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0900_:
Not only that, but he can pinpoint a Magikarp
a thousand meters below him.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1000_:
High places are Pidgeot’s territory, to the degree
that he and I might spend more time in the skies
than on land.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1200_:
We’ve been all over the world, 
but Pasio really is a nice place.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1400_:
Yeah, while Pidgeot and I were flying around,
we saw firsthand how pretty the island is.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1500_:
It shows how well this artificial island is able
to blend into nature.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1700_:
Sure is. There are Trainers and their Pokémon
gathered here from all over the world.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1800_:
We have plenty of people to battle, too, 
so that’s also a plus.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1900_:
It’s pretty much a paradise for Trainers
and Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2500_:
I’ve got this rival, Red.
You’ve seen him around, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2600_: You kinda remind me of him!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2700_: You’re like a crimson flame quietly burning.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2800_:
But even though you’re on the quiet side, you’re
hiding some awesome power, too, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_3200_: No, I’m sure of it. Pidgeot agrees, too.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3300_:
That’s why I have to take you down
myself someday!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3400_: OK... Maybe that came out a bit strong.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3500_:
But anyway, I’m traveling around the world so
that I can get even one step closer to being the
absolute best.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3600_:
Right now, I don’t think I’d lose to either you
or Red!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3700_:
What? Don’t be overconfident?
Come on, Pidgeot...
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3800_:
How am I supposed to keep my feet on the
ground if I’m flying high with you, buddy?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_3900_: I’ll blast you out of the sky!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_4000_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0302_4100_: I’ll fly just as high and catch you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_4200_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4300_:
But if you’re gonna try your hand, I’d recommend
you try sooner rather than later.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4400_: We’re as free as the wind, after all.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4500_:
If we get bored, we’ll wander away to who
knows where next.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4600_: You’re the same, too, aren’t you? I can tell.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4700_: Birds of a feather and all that!
